english.title: Liar
text: You call your love simple admiration
And longing in your eyes beats you
You, longing to hear my stories,
And get jealous for no reasons
I don't show up for a day, you ask my friends (about me)
And live waiting for my answer,
Believe me & feel what I'm feeling
Why would you love & pretend to be forgetting
You would be my address & my people,
If your heart says we're lovers

arabic.title: لمحونى
text: أنا عمرى ليك و بيك .. تكمل حياتى
حسيت ما بين إيديك .. أحاسيس رقيقة
أنت اللى روحى فيك .. أنت الحقيقة
اتكلموا عن حبنا و قالو ، قالو ، قالو  ...
مع إنى عايشة بيه ساكن عيونى
و فى كل يوم يزيد شوقه و حنانه

english.title: Glimpsed
text: They glimpsed me in your eyes.. & knew the story
My lifetime is for you & with you.. my life becomes complete.
I felt with you.. many delicate feelings.
You the one owning my soul.. You are the truth.
My heart was for you from long time
Even if a hundred years go by.
At others', a lot of tenderness (too).
You could take some of it,
As my love is much greater
O my! ......... A lot I have loved you, o my!
O my! ......... Your love gave me life
And I grew in your love
They talked about our love & said, said, said ...   aaah
A lot they've said "Leave him!", a lot they've blamed me,
Even though I was staying alive with him living in my eyes.
No matter how far he goes, he knows his place,
And each day his longing & love increase.

arabic.title: يا ليل
text: يا ليل يا ليلى .. يا ليل يا ليلى
يا ليل يا ليلى .. باحبك نور هايم فى كيانى
يا ليل يا ليلى .. وده انت السر اللي في وجدانى
يا ليل ياليلى .. وباعشق فيك كل الحنية
حبيبى باحبك يا اللى مليت الدنيا عليا
ياليل ياليلى .. في بعدك عنى باحس بغربة
ياليل ياليلى .. وغير القرب معاك مش طالبة
ياليل ياليلى .. و أبسط شيء ممكن يكفينا
حبيبى باحبك مهما يطول الصعب علينا
ياليل ياليلى .. هقولك ليه انا قلبى مسلّم
ياليل ياليلى .. وقبلك كان الفرح ناسينى
يا ليل يا ليلى .. يا ليل يا ليلى

english.title: O Night!
text: O night, my night .. O night, my night!
O night, my night.. "I love you", a light roaming inside me
O night, my night.. And you are the secret in my self
O night, my night.. And I love in you all the kindness
My love, I love you.. You filled up my world!
O night, my night.. Away from you, I feel estranged
O night, my night.. And other than nearness to you I won't ask
O night, my night.. And the simplest things would be enough for us
My love, I love you, no matter how long hard-life will be for us
O night, my night.. And your love taught me to speak (out loud)
O night, my night.. Will tell you why my heart is giving in
O night, my night.. And before you, joy forgot me
My love, I love you.. I need your heart to protect me.
O night, my night .. O night, my night!
